data.title: My Favorite Books
data.meta_description: Classic Novels Emma by Jane Austen Persuasion by Jane Austen Little Women by Louisa May Alcott The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien Kristin Lavransdatter by Sigrid Undset Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck East of Eden by John Steinbeck The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn by Mark Twain Brideshead Revisited by Evelyn Waugh…
data.text:
Classic Novels

Persuasion by Jane Austen

The Age of Innocence by Edith Wharton

The Scarlett Pimpernel by Emmuska Orczy

Murder on the Orient Express by Agatha Christie

The Scarlett Letter by Nathaniel Hawthorne

To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee

Middlemarch by George Eliot

Catholic Books

Story of a Soul by St. Thérèse of Lisieux

Essays on Woman by Edith Stein (St. Teresa Benedicta of the Cross)

A Call to a Deeper Love: The Family Correspondence of the Parents of Saint Therese of the Child Jesus by St. Zèlie Martin and St. Louis Martin

The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien

Kristin Lavransdatter by Sigrid Undset

The Sinner’s Guide to Natural Family Planning by Simcha Fisher

Something Other Than God: How I Passionately Sought Happiness and Accidentally Found It by Jennifer Fulwiler

Into the Deep by Abigail Favale

Twelve Little Ways to Transform Your Heart: Lessons in Holiness and Evangelization from St. Thérèse of Lisieux by Susan Muto

The Other Side of Beauty: Embracing God’s Vision for Love and True Worth by Leah Darrow

Edith Stein, a Biography by Waltraud Herbstrith

The Reed of God: A New Edition of a Spiritual Classic by Caryll Houselander

The Seven Storey Mountain by Thomas Merton

Embracing Edith Stein: Wisdom for Women from St. Teresa Benedicta of the Cross by Anne Costa

One Beautiful Dream: The Rollicking Tale of Family Chaos, Personal Passions, and Saying Yes to Them Both by Jennifer Fulwiler

Marian Consecration With Aquinas: A Nine Day Path for Growing Closer to the Mother of God by Matt Fradd

The Supreme Vocation of Women: According to St. John Paul II by Melissa Maleski

Carmelite Spirituality: The Way of Carmelite Prayer and Contemplation by Cardinal Anders Arborelius, OCD

The Awakening of Miss Prim by Natalia Sanmartín Fenollera

The Secret Diary of Lizzie Bennet by Bernie Su and Kate Rorick

The Awakening of Miss Prim by Natalia Sanmartín Fenollera

The nonfiction of Brené Brown
